macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Indian Markets Open Flat on Special Sunday Session for Union Budget 2026
items.summary: Nifty 50 and Sensex opened marginally higher by 0.05% and 0.14% respectively on February 1, 2026, a rare Sunday trading day ahead of the Union Budget presentation by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. Markets traded flat to slightly positive amid caution, with Nifty around 25,300 and Sensex near 82,500 as the budget unfolds.

items.title: Nifty Slips Below 25,300 as Finance Minister Presents Budget 2026
items.summary: Indian benchmark indices showed mixed movements during the special Sunday trading session, with Nifty dipping below 25,300 and Sensex trading flat around 82,300 while the Union Budget 2026 is presented. Investor caution prevails ahead of key policy announcements on taxation, spending, and economic growth.

items.title: Markets Volatile Ahead of Union Budget; Friday Close Lower for Nifty and Sensex
items.summary: Indian markets closed lower on January 30 with Nifty down 0.39% and Sensex down 0.36%, reflecting caution ahead of the Budget amid global cues and geopolitical tensions. Special trading on February 1 expected to see heightened volatility as investors react to budget measures.

items.title: Key Stocks in Focus: Meesho, Bajaj Auto, Adani Green Report Q3 Results
items.summary: Several companies including Meesho, Bajaj Auto, Adani Green, IDBI Bank, and Delhivery are in spotlight during today's trading due to third-quarter earnings and developments, amid the special Budget session. Markets remain fragile after Nifty's 2% January decline.

items.title: Steel Stocks Surge on Safeguard Duty; Titan Hits Record High
items.summary: JSW Steel, Tata Steel, and Jindal Steel shares rose up to 4% following safeguard duty announcements, while jewellery stocks like Titan reached all-time highs and Senco Gold jumped 14%. Other movers include IEX, Hindustan Copper, and ICICI Prudential AMC amid positive sentiment.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.summary: [{"title":"Bitcoin Plunges Below $80,000 Triggering $2.2 Billion Liquidations","summary":"Bitcoin fell below $76,000 briefly on February 1, 2026, causing nearly $2.2 billion in cryptocurrency futures liquidations across the network, the highest single-day volume since October 11. ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: OpenAI Launches 'ChatGPT Health' for Personalized Healthcare
items.summary: OpenAI debuted 'ChatGPT Health', integrating medical records with AI for personalized patient experiences and streamlined care. This tool aims to redefine patient-doctor interactions with a preventive focus.

items.title: $60 Billion Investment by Nvidia, Microsoft, Amazon, and OpenAI in Generative AI
items.summary: Nvidia, Microsoft, Amazon, and OpenAI announced a collaboration with up to $60 billion to boost generative AI computational capabilities and scale applications.

items.title: Apple Enhances Vision Pro with Emotional AI and Augmented Reality
items.summary: Apple introduced improved Vision Pro features blending augmented reality with emotional AI systems for more user-friendly innovations.

items.title: Meta Announces AI Shopping Tools with $115 Billion Infrastructure Boost
items.summary: Meta revealed intelligent shopping tools using AI for personalized product recommendations and autonomous commerce, backed by a $115 billion infrastructure investment.

items.title: Google Launches 'AI Plus' Subscription at $7.99/Month with Gemini 3 Pro
items.summary: Google introduced the 'AI Plus' subscription providing access to advanced AI tools like Gemini 3 Pro for tasks such as filmmaking and professional writing.

items.title: UAlbany Study Reveals Stratified Geometry in AI Agents' Learning
items.summary: Researchers at University at Albany discovered that AI agents organize information in stratified geometric spaces rather than smooth manifolds, offering new insights into AI decision-making and training.

items.title: New NLP Study Finds Minimal Differences Among Top LLMs, ChatGPT Slightly Ahead
items.summary: A February 1, 2026 study evaluated LLMs like ChatGPT, Gemini, and DeepSeek on creativity, accuracy, and explanations, finding minimal performance differences with ChatGPT edging out others.
items.source: ICCK Transactions on Emerging Topics in Artificial Intelligence

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: February 2026 Brings Stacked Video Game Release Calendar
items.summary: February 2026 features a surprisingly robust lineup of video game releases across multiple genres, including platformers, horror, puzzle games, shooters, and RPGs. Notable titles include Dragon Quest VII Reimagined (Feb 5), Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties (Feb 12), and High on Life 2 (Feb 13).

items.title: Women in Games Launches 2026 Manifesto for Industry Change
items.summary: Women in Games released its 2026 Manifesto addressing gender imbalance in the gaming industry, emphasizing that while women comprise nearly half of all players, they represent fewer than a third of the workforce. The manifesto outlines 14 core reasons for empowering women and introduces the 'Women in Games Voices' initiative.

items.title: Gaming Industry Faces Aftermath of Massive 2025 Layoffs
items.summary: New data reveals that approximately one-third of the global gaming workforce was impacted by layoffs throughout 2025, leaving the industry at a crossroads as it enters 2026.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
